scripts.start: npm run bundle_all; npm run watch & cd dist; instant
scripts.watch: watchify app.js -o dist/en/bundle.js -t [ pkgify --packages [ --i18n i18n/en/en.js ] ] -t hbsfy
scripts.bundle: mkdir -p dist/en; browserify app.js -o dist/en/bundle.js -t [ pkgify --packages [ --i18n ./i18n/en/en.js ] ] -t hbsfy
scripts.bundle_es: mkdir -p dist/es; browserify app.js -o dist/es/bundle.js -t [ pkgify --packages [ --i18n i18n/es/es.js ] ] -t [ ./i18n/i18ify.js --lang es ] -t hbsfy
scripts.bundle_de: mkdir -p dist/de; browserify app.js -o dist/de/bundle.js -t [ pkgify --packages [ --i18n i18n/de/de.js ] ] -t [ ./i18n/i18ify.js --lang de ] -t hbsfy
scripts.bundle_all: npm run bundle & npm run bundle_de & npm run bundle_es; npm run html
